body_html: Only thing I can think of is an arbitrary channel count, not sure if it is already there or not. For example, that would be useful for transforming a one hot encoding when doing image segmentation. Thanks for the awesome work!

body: Only thing I can think of is an arbitrary channel count, not sure if it is already there or not. For example, that would be useful for transforming a one hot encoding when doing image segmentation. Thanks for the awesome work!
